categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Mick" was one of the thousands of small, flying INS-444 window installation droids on Coruscant. It worked together with CLE-004, taking instructions from a central computer. Together, the two droids replaced the bedroom window of Senator Amidala's Coruscant apartment after the original window was destroyed through the actions of ASN-121 and Obi-Wan Kenobi.
